title: Min Engine Version
description: Validates and updates the min_engine_version field in pack manifests. This version specifies the minimum Minecraft version required to use the pack.

fields.title: BP Version Defined
fields.description: Confirms that min_engine_version is defined in the behavior pack manifest header.

fields.title: BP Major Low
fields.description: Warning when the behavior pack's min_engine_version major number is below the current Minecraft version. Update to access newer features.

fields.title: BP Major High
fields.description: Error when the behavior pack's min_engine_version major number is above the current Minecraft version. The pack may not load.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the min_engine_version exceeding current

fields.title: BP Minor Low
fields.description: Warning when the behavior pack's min_engine_version minor number is below the current Minecraft version.

fields.title: BP Minor High
fields.description: Error when the behavior pack's min_engine_version minor number is above the current Minecraft version.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the min_engine_version exceeding current

fields.title: BP Patch Low
fields.description: Information when the behavior pack's min_engine_version patch number is below the current Minecraft version.

fields.title: BP Patch High
fields.description: Warning when the behavior pack's min_engine_version patch number is above the current Minecraft version.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the min_engine_version exceeding current

fields.title: No Manifest
fields.description: Error when no manifest.json file was found in the pack root.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the expected manifest path

fields.title: Version Errors
fields.description: Error when the min_engine_version field could not be parsed or validated.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the version processing error

fields.title: RP Version Defined
fields.description: Confirms that min_engine_version is defined in the resource pack manifest header.

fields.title: RP Major Low
fields.description: Warning when the resource pack's min_engine_version major number is below the current Minecraft version.

fields.title: RP Major High
fields.description: Error when the resource pack's min_engine_version major number is above the current Minecraft version.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the min_engine_version exceeding current

fields.title: RP Minor Low
fields.description: Warning when the resource pack's min_engine_version minor number is below the current Minecraft version.

fields.title: RP Minor High
fields.description: Error when the resource pack's min_engine_version minor number is above the current Minecraft version.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the min_engine_version exceeding current

fields.title: RP Patch Low
fields.description: Information when the resource pack's min_engine_version patch number is below the current Minecraft version.

fields.title: RP Patch High
fields.description: Warning when the resource pack's min_engine_version patch number is above the current Minecraft version.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the min_engine_version exceeding current

fields.title: Version Retrieved
fields.description: Status indicating the current Minecraft version was retrieved for comparison.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the retrieved Minecraft version

fields.title: Version Parsed
fields.description: Status indicating the Minecraft version string was parsed into version numbers.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the parsed version components
